channel.title: Ipodscape 517-525
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/28kn9jr.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Welcome to Ipodscape 517-525![/size]
First off i would like to list some features this server has.
All pvp armours including: Vesta, Statius, Morrigan's, Zurials, Many New items including: Dragon defender, Arcane stream necklace, Amulet of ranging, Full torva, Chaotics, Korasi, Staff of light 100% special attacks on all weapons 100% magic Storm of Armadyl spell Full void affects 100% 100% pvm with many bosses Many custom minigames Many commands Great pking Many custom items such as: Bridder's ring, Bandos cape, Evil spirit shield, Bandos kiteshield, Chaos gauntlets, Pro's cape, Amulet of rage, Juggernaut's spear, Juggernaut's cloak, Juggernaut's helmet, Juggernaut's amulet, Juggernaut's platebody, Juggernaut's platelegs, Juggernaut's boots, Juggernaut's gloves, Juggernaut's ring, Juggernauts shield, Armadyl bow, Bank whistle, Armadyl arrows, Ipod platelegs, Ipod chestplate, Spike boots, Icebow, Ice arrows, Range buckler, Dragon jewel amulet, And alot more!! come see yourself!
Pictures!(Shops, Pvp, Weapons, Pvm)
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2a6o2ug.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/108fbqf.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Now for the special attacks[/size]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2lm2lqr.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]Monsters/Bosses[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20fc4jt.jpg[/img]
And finally for the links!
Download link
http://www.mediafire.com/?n7s29vd82865hcb
Forums link
http://ipodscape.forumotion.com/
